subject: Pole Vault
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Renaud Lavillenie of France, an Olympic champion and a world-record holder, needed only two jumps to win his third straight pole vault gold medal at the European championships in Zurich.
snippet: Renaud Lavillenie of France, an Olympic champion and a world-record holder, needed only two jumps to win his third straight pole vault gold medal at the European championships in Zurich.
